title: Morphic UI Playground
subtitle: Experimental generative UI with LLM backends
description: A sandbox for testing LLM-driven UI generation. You describe a component in natural language and watch it render in real-time. Built to explore the future of no-code development.
story: What if your design system could understand English? This demo answers that question â€” imperfectly, but fascinatingly.

title: Dhaka Traffic Oracle
subtitle: Predicting traffic jams before they happen
description: A real-time traffic prediction prototype for Dhaka city using historical patterns, weather data, and prayer time correlations. Achieves 74% accuracy on 30-minute predictions.
story: Anyone who has lived in Dhaka knows the traffic is an organism of its own. This prototype tries to understand it.

title: Raga Visualizer
subtitle: Synesthetic music visualization for classical ragas
description: An audio-reactive visual system that maps South Asian classical ragas to color, shape, and motion. Each note triggers a particle system tuned to the emotional register of the raga.
story: Music and data visualization share the same grammar. This demo is a meditation on that idea.
